mapper.select: select c.*, nickname from comment_tb as c inner join user_tb as u on c.user_id = u.id where board_id in (select board_id from board_tb where board_id = #{boardId}) order by id asc
mapper.insert: insert into comment_tb (content, user_id, board_id) values (#{content}, #{userId}, #{boardId})
mapper.update: update comment_tb set content = #{content} where id = #{id}
